sources.source-info: World Bank, World Development Indicators database.

country-stats.name: China, People's Republic
country-stats.footnote: Excluding Hong Kong and Macao, listed separately.

country-stats.name: Cyprus
country-stats.footnote: Excluding settlers from Turkey in the 'Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus'.

country-stats.name: Finland
country-stats.footnote: Including the Åland Islands, listed separately.

country-stats.name: India
country-stats.footnote: Including the Indian-controlled part of Jammu and Kashmir.

country-stats.name: Israel
country-stats.footnote: Including the Golan region, annexed from Syria, and East Jerusalem.

country-stats.name: Kosovo
country-stats.footnote: Declared independence from Serbia in February 2008.

country-stats.name: Morocco
country-stats.footnote: Including the disputed territory of Western Sahara.

country-stats.name: Pakistan
country-stats.footnote: Excluding Azad (`Free’) Jammu and Kashmir and Gilgit-Baltistan.

country-stats.name: Palestinian Autonomous Areas
country-stats.footnote: Comprising the West Bank, including Israeli-occupied East Jerusalem, and the Gaza Strip.

country-stats.name: Spain
country-stats.footnote: Including Ceuta and Melilla, listed separately.

country-stats.name: Ukraine
country-stats.footnote: Including the Republic of Crimea and Sevastopol City (admitted to the Russian Federation in March 2014).
